DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate metabolic effect 3 different nutritional compound . Fasting ( 36 hour ) create catabolic state comparable catabolic state see acute illness . This study randomize , placebo cross-over study investigate 8 healthy men 4 separated day ( least 3 week trial ) . - High leucine content drink - Low leucine content drink - Low leucine content drink + HMB - Carbohydrate ( isocaloric ) The investigator hypothesize nutritional supplement may counteract catabolic process different way degree .
DOC.brief_title: Leucine Beta-hydroxy-beta-methylbutyrate ( HMB ) Anabolic Nutrients After 36 Hours Fasting
DOC.criteria: male gender 20 < BMI < 30 Age > 20 year old Written consent start study Allergy soya product ore egg Diabetes Epilepsy Infection Immune defect Heart disease Dysregulated hypertension Participating trial use radioactive tracer xrays last year .
